oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Visite of Lt. John P. Loasy 21st Mich. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 21st Mich. Inf. Regt., USA fought in the Western Theater in the Army of the Cumberland and first saw action at Perryville, Kentucky in October 1862 as part of General Phil Sheridan's Division. The regiment fought at Chickamauga, Missionary Ridge, through the Atlanta Campaign, the March to the Sea and the final campaigns through the Carolinas in 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Loasy, John P.
